'''Leonard 'Xlson' Gram''', formerly known as '''Leonard Axelsson''', is a former employee at [[Mojang Studios]].<ref>{{tweet|notch|123295374076153856}}</ref> He worked with backend development.<ref>{{tweet|xlson|122274219735265280}}</ref> On December 21, 2017 he announced that he was leaving Mojang.<ref>{{tweet|xlson|943872541755609088}}</ref>
